data.title: The Global Professional Tennis Coach Association (GPTCA)
data.meta_description: (GPTCA) is an international organization dedicated to educating, training, and assisting professional tennis coaches who wish to evolve at the ATP World Tour.
data.text:
2020-to-date

Coaching team of Kei Nishikori (with Michael Chang)

2004-2008

Vice President of Belarus Tennis Federation

Playing Career

Career High ATP ranking in doubles #1 / in singles #18

Won 52 titles in doubles and one in singles

Won six Grand Slam titles in doubles: US Open (2000, 2002), Roland Garros (2005, 2006, 2011, 2012)

Won 16 Masters 1000 titles in doubles and two year-end final events

Won 2012 London Olympics mixed doubles gold medal w/Azarenka

- Belarusian flagbearer at 2012 Olympics opening ceremony

Won four Grand Slam titles in mixed doubles: Wimbledon (1998), US Open (1998, 2007, 2013)
